titles.title: George Thomas "Mickey" Leland Hunger Relief Stamp Act
To allow postal patrons to contribute to funding for emergency food relief within the United States through the voluntary purchase of certain specially issued United States postage stamps.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Government Reform.

bill.summary: 1/3/2001--Introduced. George Thomas "Mickey" Leland Hunger Relief Stamp Act - Directs the U.S. Postal Service to establish a special first-class postage rate allowing postal patrons to contribute to funding for emergency food relief within the United States and the Africa Food Security Initiative through the voluntary purchase of certain specially issued U.S. postage stamps.
